name: is-there
description: Check if a file or directory exists in a given path.
author: Ionică Bizău <bizauionica@gmail.com> (https://ionicabizau.net)

description.p: Because `fs.exists` and `fs.existsSync` ~~will be~~ are deprecated and in some cases we still need them!

blockquote: `fs.exists()` is an anachronism and exists only for historical reasons. There should almost never be a reason to use it in your own code.

In particular, checking if a file exists before opening it is an anti-pattern that leaves you vulnerable to race conditions: another process may remove the file between the calls to `fs.exists()` and `fs.open()`. Just open the file and handle the error when it's not there.
